events.message: I recently purchased a jacket but need to request a refund because the size does not fit at all and I want to return the item.
The customer issue was categorized as Refund after identifying keywords related to return and money back.
Customer support agent Sarah has been assigned to handle the refund request for the returned jacket.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I understand you want to return your jacket and request a refund. I'm here to help.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket is unused and in its original packaging?
My order number is 123456789. The jacket is still unused and I have kept it in the original packaging as received.
Thank you for the info. We will initiate the refund once we receive the returned jacket. I am sending you the return shipping label now.
I appreciate your quick response and the return label. I will send the jacket back by tomorrow.
We have received your returned jacket and processed the refund successfully. The amount should reflect in your account within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund. Please let us know if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Since the refund issue is resolved and there are no further inquiries, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting support.
